entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Friday 13 January 2023
